presentationTable.name: Project Costs in Project Ledger Currency - ITD
presentationTable.description: Inception to date Project Costs derived from Cost Distribution Lines - based on Receiver/Project Fiscal Date

presentationColumns.name: Raw Cost - ITD
presentationColumns.description: Cumulative Sum of Raw cost from start of the Project to the reporting time period selected
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - PRJ - Project Costing.Raw Cost - ITD
